response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those seeking excellence in its category. Given its high-quality features and performance, I estimate its worth to be well above $120. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $150. This price not only reflects the product's true value but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire it at a special rate. I trust you'll find the product to exceed your expectations. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 150}
